meanings.definition: Infected with or caused by a pox
meanings.sent1: Her poxy skin rash required medical attention.
meanings.sent2: The poxy chickenpox outbreak affected many children.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his poxy mosquito bites made him look like a polka-dotted monster.
meanings.sent4: The poxy disease spread rapidly through the village.
meanings.sent5: The poxy infection left her feeling weak and tired.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of annoyance or frustration
meanings.sent1: Oh, poxy! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent2: Poxy! Why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent3: Poxy me, I spilled coffee on my shirt before the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The poxy traffic made me late for my appointment.
meanings.sent5: Poxy weather ruined our picnic plans.
